Facebook

Method Detail

init

public static void init(java.lang.String APIKey)
Initialize the Facebook API. Call this method before using any facebook feature.

Parameters:
APIKey - - The API Key for your facebook app. This is listed for each of your apps at http://www.facebook.com/developers/apps.php

getAPIKey

public static java.lang.String getAPIKey()
The API Key set in the init() method.

isLoggedIn

public static boolean isLoggedIn()
Returns true if the user is currently logged in and has granted access to the application.

addLoginHandler

public static com.google.gwt.event.shared.HandlerRegistration addLoginHandler(FacebookLoginHandler handler)
A Facebook login handler is fired whenever the Facebook connection status changes. For example when a user logs in or logs out.

getConnectionStatus

public static Facebook.ConnectState getConnectionStatus()
Get the current status of the Facebook connection. See the ConnectionState enum for possible values.

login

public static void login(com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.AsyncCallback<java.lang.Boolean> callback)
If no facebook user is logged in, present the login dialog.

Parameters:
callback - - onSuccess is called when the users successfully logs in. If the user cancels the login dialog, no callback is made. The result value is true if the login is successful and false if it is not.

getLoggedInUserId

public static java.lang.String getLoggedInUserId()
Get the id of the Facebook user that is currently logged in. Return null if no user is logged in and authorized.

APIClient

public static APIClient APIClient()
Use the APIClient to interact with Facebook through the standard APIs.
